# ðŸ¤š Disregarded Harmful

With the Disregarded add-on, your corpse cannot be reported.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Disregarded that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the percentage players have of getting Disregarded
  • Impostors can become Disregarded
    • ON: Impostors can become this role
    • OFF: Impostors cannot become this role
  • Crewmates can become Disregarded
    • ON: Crewmates can become this role
    • OFF: Crewmates cannot become this role
  • Neutrals can become Disregarded
    • ON: Neutrals can become this role
    • OFF: Neutrals cannot become this role
